name: All-Rounder Wanda
description: An all-rounder with a wealth of experience
story: Wanda has come to realize that her inability to concentrate on only one thing also makes her extremely capable of handling many things at once. With the knowledge and skills she has acquired so far, she decides to advertise herself as a mercenary capable of taking requests of any kind.

relations.description: Though Wanda thinks Sven is a good leader with a great personality and talent, she has no intention of joining his mercenary company.
Wanda thinks Hurado is sweeter than he looks, but too innocent.
Wanda hopes she can prove herself to Azalea by becoming successful as an all-rounder.

specialty.name: Versatility
specialty.description: She's more capable than people give her credit for.

type.name: Unknown Knowledge
type.description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.

debuffs.name: Target
debuffs.effect: Increases damage received by the target by 15%, while decreasing Evasion by 15%.

debuffs.name: Unhealable
debuffs.effect: Makes the target unable to be healed.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

localize.name: 万能解決士 ワンダ

skill1.name: 弱点射撃
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。対象が標的状態の場合、ダメージがUPし、アクションゲージを10.0%DOWNさせる。

skill2.name: 照準
skill2.desc: 毎ターン開始時、ランダムな対象に80.0%の確率で標的を2ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: 百発百中
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、80.0%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与し、50.0%の確率で回復不可を2ターンの間付与する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、80.0%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与し、50.0%の確率で回復不可を2ターンの間付与する。
